Class Polymer

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.chemistry.polymer.Polymer
public class Polymer extends Object
Polymer chemistry calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Constructor Details

    • Polymer

      public Polymer(String name, String repeatUnit, double repeatUnitMass, double Mn, double Mw)

  • Method Details

    • fromDP

      public static Polymer fromDP(String name, String repeatUnit, double repeatUnitMass, int DP)
      Creates polymer from degree of polymerization.

    • polydispersityIndex

      public double polydispersityIndex()
      Polydispersity index: PDI = Mw/Mn PDI = 1 for monodisperse, >1 for polydisperse

    • degreeOfPolymerization

      public double degreeOfPolymerization()
      Number-average degree of polymerization. DPn = Mn / M0

    • intrinsicViscosity

      public static double intrinsicViscosity(double M, double K, double a)
      Mark-Houwink equation: intrinsic viscosity. [η] = K · M^a
      Parameters:
      M - Molecular weight
      K - Mark-Houwink constant (depends on polymer-solvent-temperature)
      a - Mark-Houwink exponent (0.5-0.8 for flexible chains)
      Returns:
      Intrinsic viscosity (dL/g)

    • endToEndDistance

      public static double endToEndDistance(int n, double l)
      End-to-end distance for ideal chain. invalid input: '<'R²>^(1/2) = l·sqrt(n) for freely-jointed chain
      Parameters:
      n - Number of segments
      l - Segment length (Å)
      Returns:
      RMS end-to-end distance (Å)

    • radiusOfGyration

      public static double radiusOfGyration(int n, double l)
      Radius of gyration for ideal chain. Rg = invalid input: '<'R²>^(1/2) / sqrt(6)

    • floryHugginsParameter

      public static double floryHugginsParameter(double Vs, double deltaP, double deltaS, double T)
      Flory-Huggins interaction parameter estimation. χ = V_s(δ_p - δ_s)² / RT
      Parameters:
      Vs - Molar volume of solvent (cm³/mol)
      deltaP - Solubility parameter of polymer (cal/cm³)^0.5
      deltaS - Solubility parameter of solvent
      T - Temperature (K)
      Returns:
      Flory-Huggins χ parameter

    • foxEquation

      public static double foxEquation(double w1, double Tg1, double Tg2)
      Glass transition temperature estimation (Fox equation for copolymers). 1/Tg = w1/Tg1 + w2/Tg2
      Parameters:
      w1 - Weight fraction of component 1
      Tg1 - Tg of homopolymer 1 (K)
      Tg2 - Tg of homopolymer 2 (K)
      Returns:
      Estimated Tg (K)

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • getRepeatUnit

      public String getRepeatUnit()

    • getRepeatUnitMass

      public double getRepeatUnitMass()

    • getMn

      public double getMn()

    • getMw

      public double getMw()

    • generateMolecule

      public Molecule generateMolecule(int dp)
      Generates a representative single-chain Molecule with the specified Degree of Polymerization.

      Note: Currently generates a simplified carbon backbone structure for visualization. Future versions should parse the 'repeatUnit' string.

      Parameters:
      dp - Degree of Polymerization (number of repeat units)
      Returns:
      A Molecule representing a single polymer chain
